pullrequest.title: Mouse selection highlights objects & scene tree is resizable

content.raw: These strings ("name", "range", "specular", etc.) should be defined elsewhere, e.g., as preprocessor macros.  Otherwise we run the risk of having different strings being used in different places.  Also, defining them in one location is the first step toward supporting localization.  That's a big task, so I've ticketed it separately, to be done later: #!/osrf/gazebo/issue/62).
content.html: These strings ("name", "range", "specular", etc.) should be defined elsewhere, e.g., as preprocessor macros. Otherwise we run the risk of having different strings being used in different places. Also, defining them in one location is the first step toward supporting localization. That's a big task, so I've ticketed it separately, to be done later: #!/osrf/gazebo/issue/62).
